Koki &Sara 😍😍 😊 from the set of #loveajkal2 خب بلاخره بعد از این همه حاشیه دومین فیلم از پروژه ی امتیاز علی با سارا و کارتیک منتشر شد ، فقط لبخند سارا رو باشید 😊😍😍چرا انقدر اینا عشقن با هم ؟؟؟ . . .follow @kartikaaryan_iranianfc for more update . . . . . #filmfare #sartik #salmankhan #karanjohar #ranveersingh #sushantsinghrajput #kedarnath #deepikapadukone #rohitshetty #katrinakaif #ranbirkapoor #aceofspace #sonuketitukisweety #bollywood #zero #actors #gameofthrones #simmba #gullyboy #toodles #blockbuster #lukachuppi #kritisanon #queen #khan #shahrukhkhan #bollywood @kartikaaryan @saraalikhan95 💫💕 .
A post shared by KA🇮🇷(f4f) (@kartikaaryan_iranianfc) on Mar 17, 2019 at 4:34am PDT
title: Complaint Filed Against Sara Ali Khan For Riding Pillion Without Helmet, Police Say Action Will Be Taken
description: Police complaint has been filed against Sara Ali Khan. In a statement, Delhi Police have said that necessary action will be taken against the actress under the Motor Vehicles Act after facts pertaining to the incident are received, perused and verified. In the video, Kartik Aryan can be seen riding the bike. Sara Ali Khan is sitting behind him. Sara Ali Khan is not wearing the helmet.
